page.title: 06Yeovil's Sorting Office.
page.content: Yeovil has the largest Crown Office of 10 under the Bath Head Office. { Inward Mail.}Each day Yeovil's office receive about 54000 letters, most of which go to Taunton by rail & then to Yeovil by road.They arrive at 03.30,are sorted by 05.45,ready for delivery starting at 07.00. Also, about 1600 parcels a day arrive from Bristol. { Outward Mail.}About 60000 items for dispatch per day are posted in Yeovil alone.Added to this is all post from surrounding villages over an area of 150 square miles. { Staff.}To handle this volume of mail,the office employs a manager,3 supervisors,12 postmen higher grade, 76 postmen & 4 postwomen. {Transport.}They use 29 bicycles,17 small & 6 medium vans & 1 very large van.
